dcterms:description: A freely accessible critical care database containing de-identified health data associated with over forty thousand patients who were admitted to critical care units at the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III Clinical Database

dcterms:description: A database that collects and analyzes adverse event reports submitted to the FDA, providing insights into drug safety and efficacy.
dcterms:title: FDA Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS)

dcterms:creator: Ã–zlem Uzuner

dcterms:description: A challenge dataset that focuses on the identification of concepts, assertions, and relations in clinical text, providing annotated data for evaluating natural language processing systems.
dcterms:title: 2010 Relations Challenge from i2b2

dcterms:creator: U.S. National Library of Medicine
dcterms:description: A mapping of ICD-9-CM diagnostic codes to SNOMED CT, facilitating the transition from one coding system to another.
dcterms:title: ICD-9-CM
